data.what_is: Marketing Automation is a methodology where using a technological platform as a core, has the goal to automate and optimize repetitive tasks such as emails, web tracking and social media on a digital marketing strategy.
data.product_description: Marketing Automation is a methodology where using a technological platform as a core, has the goal to automate and optimize repetitive tasks such as emails, web tracking and social media on a digital marketing strategy.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Datacrush?
It allows us to create emails easily by simply dragging and dropping elements!

What do you dislike about Datacrush?
So far, I am satisfied with it. Just having trouble finding enough mails

Recommendations to others considering Datacrush:
It is excellent to use and facilitates a lot of the work. In my industry, however, I do not require to use all the facilitation, but if you work in a more business-oriented field, it's the best thing you can use!

What problems is Datacrush solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sending bulk emails to potential clients and also being able to collect their data from them!

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Datacrush?
It is very user-friendly and has many helpful features for users such as the Marketing platform, social marketing, Dynamic content, etc.

What do you dislike about Datacrush?
Not enough templates for landing pages and emails.

Recommendations to others considering Datacrush:
Super useful as It combines so many features in one place such as lead scoring, analytics/ROI tracking, landing pages, drip campaigns and search marketing.

What problems is Datacrush solving and how is that benefiting you?
Because it combines so many features in one place, it helped me focus on using it alone to cover my business needs instead of using different softwares.
